short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Single click to hacker news discussion of any article.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jump To HN is a single button that allows you access Hacker News discussion of the web page you are on. 

Why install the plugin?

1) If you are reading a good article and want to check what the Hacker News community has to say about it, it's just one click away. 

2) Know if the article you are reading has already been submitted to Hacker News. 

3) With one glance, know how many HN comments are posted about the article.
 
4) If you open the article from the Hacker News site, you have an easy way to read the comments from the article page without having to go back to the HN site.
